main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects reported in Cleveland, Ohio on October 22, 1955.
interesting points: Witnesses described a circular, bright orange glow observed at various altitudes, some reported a humming sound, Reports indicated a glowing object that accelerated rapidly, Some witnesses compared the object to a traditional flying saucer and estimated its size to be as large as a house, The sightings coincided with testimonies of a light in the sky that was motionless before it zoomed away.
sighted object: Bright orange circular object with alternating colors of lights
witness description: Witnesses included a scientist and local residents who observed the object at varying times and described its size, shape, and behavior.
